jobTitle: Sr Executive Coach / Corporate Trainer / Instructional Designer
description:
TECHNOGEN, Inc. is a Proven Leader in providing full IT Services, Software Development and Solutions for 15 years.

TECHNOGEN is a Small & Woman Owned Minority Business with GSA Advantage Certification. We have offices in VA; MD & Offshore development centers in India. We have successfully executed 100+ projects for clients ranging from small business and non-profits to Fortune 50 companies and federal, state and local agencies.

Position: Senior Executive Coach / Corporate Trainer / Instructional Designer

Location: Washington DC

Duration: 2-3 months+ Contract

Job Description

Prior experience in US Federal training . Trainer needed for US Federal space.

Responsibilities

  • Conduct one-on-one coaching sessions with senior leaders and executives.
  • Assess clients' strengths, weaknesses, and areas for development.
  • Develop personalized coaching plans tailored to each client's needs and goals.
  • Provide ongoing support, feedback, and accountability to clients.
  • Use a variety of coaching techniques and tools to facilitate client growth.
  • Help clients develop leadership skills and improve their performance.
  • Assist clients in setting and achieving professional goals.
  • Build strong, trusting relationships with clients.
  • Maintain confidentiality and professionalism at all times.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest coaching methodologies and best practices.
  • Facilitate group coaching sessions and workshops as needed.
  • Collaborate with other coaches and team members to provide comprehensive support.
  • Track and measure client progress and adjust coaching plans as needed.
  • Provide clients with resources and tools to support their development.
  • Help clients navigate challenges and overcome obstacles.
  • Encourage clients to take ownership of their development and growth.
  • Promote a positive and supportive coaching environment.
  • Continuously improve your coaching skills and knowledge.
  • Participate in professional development opportunities and training.
  • Contribute to the overall success of the coaching program.

Requirements

  • Proven experience as an Executive Coach or similar role.
  • Strong understanding of business and leadership principles.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • High level of emotional intelligence and empathy.
  • Ability to build strong, trusting relationships with clients.
  • Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Experience with a variety of coaching techniques and tools.
  • Ability to maintain confidentiality and professionalism.
  • Strong organizational and time-management skills.
  • Ability to assess clients' strengths and areas for development.
  • Experience developing personalized coaching plans.
  • Ability to provide constructive feedback and support.
  • Strong facilitation and presentation skills.
  • Commitment to continuous learning and professional development.
  • Ability to track and measure client progress.
  • Experience working with senior leaders and executives.
  • Ability to adapt coaching style to meet clients' needs.
  • Passion for helping others succeed.
  • Relevant coaching certification or accreditation is a plus.

Best Regards,

Ashok Kumar

Sr. Talent Acquisition Specialist

Phone: 443-832-6103

Email: ashok.c@technogeninc.com

Web: www.technogeninc.com
